pageContext.claim: “'Ever since (Mini Mike) Bloomberg’s bad debate performances, his support has dropped.' @abcnews Dropped a lot. Only his highly paid consultants, who are laughing all the way to the bank, still support him...And by the way, he did not poll well as mayor in handling crisis!”
pageContext.analysis: When Bloomberg was mayor of New York, polls were mixed about how he handled a crisis, according to a Politifact review. Not all bad and not all good.
